name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 3, Liaoning. Migrant workers demanded their wages in front of the government building. Workers shouted to the police, "Please ask the government to help get back our hard-earned money."
December 26, Chongzuo, Guangxi. Lee and Man Paper Factory owed workers wages, and workers held banners to demand their wages.
January 1, Liuzhou, Guangxi. Workers climbed a crane to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 3, students at Anhui Normal University reported that although the epidemic had long ended, the school was still under lockdown. Face scanning is required to enter the school and the dormitory, and gates are installed at the school gate and the dormitory gate. Students complained that if there was a fire or emergency, they would need to scan their faces one by one to pass through the gates.
Previously, a female student complained to the counselor that the school's control was too strict, and then the student disappeared. The counselor said that she had mental problems and was currently recuperating at home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The accident was caused by a fault such as a straight signal not lighting up, which led to a collision between two vehicles. The authorities have not yet announced the final result of the accident responsibility determination.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 2, Pang Donglai announced the implementation standards for employees’ marriage. Employees are required not to receive or pay dowry when they get married. They are not required to rely on their parents’ savings to buy a house or a car. If their parents are able to afford it, they can temporarily borrow money from their parents without affecting their quality of life, but they must return the money to their parents in the future. Violations will be considered violations of corporate values, and they will only enjoy statutory labor remuneration and benefits in the next 12 months, and will not enjoy the company’s rewards and benefits beyond the statutory limits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 30, 24, the last nail house in Xian Village, Guangzhou was forcibly demolished "according to law".
The owner had been stubbornly fighting with the developer for 13 years, refusing the developer's compensation of tens of millions. The foundations around his building were dug out, but he was unwilling to move.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplementary contribution from netizens: Supplementary records of money and gift coupons given by a Japanese company in Suzhou High-tech Zone to local government and state-owned enterprise leaders every year
The leaders of each sub-department of the company contact the corresponding government and state-owned enterprise leaders to give gifts on every holiday, and the amount each time ranges from 500-1000

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Jiangsu Changdian Technology Co., Ltd., notified criticism and interviewed employees who left work on time
The factory manager required that employees on 12-hour shifts could not clock out within 5 minutes after the end of the get off work time. The clerk would collect the card swiping data of the company's gate machine and count the employees who left work on time under each section chief. An email was sent out to notify criticism and interview employees who left work on time
The contributor said: 12 hours is tiring enough, and I have to continue rolling after get off work and not be allowed to leave

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Another Japanese manga author was attacked and insulted by Chinese netizens for "insulting China"
Recently, Chinese netizens discovered that Japanese adult artist Mao Yu Niu Ru complained about Chinese piracy in his fan work, and then someone discovered his previous suspected "Taiwan independence" remarks, which caused "inflammation". Many Chinese netizens therefore proposed to "boycott" and made personal attacks and insults in the comment area of the artist's X account and Pixiv account. The artist has now closed his Twitter comment area
Then the artist's B station account issued an apology statement, but because the external network platform did not forward it simultaneously, Chinese netizens did not buy it, and the operator of the artist's B station account was suspected of being "opened".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Wages owed abroad
Recently, the Fifth Engineering Bureau of China Construction was in arrears with suppliers, and Vietnamese people held banners to protest their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Taiwanese blogger "Ah Yue Pa Pa Zou" bought a SIM card at a service counter at a Chinese airport. The airport staff took the initiative to help him download a VPN and claimed: "Foreigners can legally climb over the firewall. It's just that in our country, we Chinese are not allowed to climb over the firewall. Taiwanese people will not be arrested if they are questioned by the police for climbing over the firewall." The service staff also claimed that they had never climbed over the firewall.
Full YouTube original video link:
via @YouTube

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the TV special "Anti-Corruption for the People" jointly produced by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and CCTV will be broadcast from January 5 to 8. The special selected 12 cases, a total of four episodes, namely "Punishment of Petty Corruption", "Investigation and Treatment of Wind and Corruption", "Unveiling the Invisible Cloak of Corruption", and "Using Cases to Promote Reform and Governance". 

The officials who appeared on the screen even included the Deputy Minister of the United Front Work Department: 

Sun Zhigang (former secretary of the Guizhou Provincial Party Committee): I really failed the organization's training and trust, lost the bottom line, and made serious mistakes and crimes. 

Tang Yijun (former secretary of the Party Group and chairman of the Jiangxi Provincial CPPCC): Looking at what I did, I really have no face to face and no place to hide. 

Cui Maohu (former deputy minister of the Central United Front Work Department and former director of the State Administration of Religious Affairs): It's just that I don't pay much attention to small things, and finally small things become big things. 

Sun Shutao (former member of the Party Group and vice chairman of the Shandong Provincial CPPCC): In order to be promoted and to pursue political achievements, GDP suddenly became so high, this...
fullContent:
近日 由中央纪监委与央视联合摄制的《反腐为了人民》电视专题片，将于1月5日至8日播出
专题片选取了12个案例，共四集，分别为《惩治蝇贪蚁腐》《风腐同查同治》《揭开腐败隐身衣》《以案促改促治》。

出镜官员甚至包括统战部副部长：

孙志刚（贵州省委原书记）：我确实是辜负了组织上的培养和信任，失守了底线，犯了严重的错误、罪行。

唐一军（江西省政协原党组书记、主席）：看看我的所作所为，我真是无颜面对、无地自容。

崔茂虎（中央统战部原副部长、国家宗教事务局原局长）：就是对小事小节不太注意，最后小事就变成大事。

孙述涛（山东省政协原党组成员、副主席）：为了提拔，为了追求政绩，GDP突然弄那么高，这个我是很后悔的。

王宜林（中国石油天然气集团有限公司原党组书记、董事长）：成了贪官，又是一个政治骗子的俘虏，现在我身败名裂。

徐文荣（中国石油天然气集团有限公司原党组副书记、副总经理）：把周显明介绍到中石油，给企业带来了极大的伤害，受到惩罚的时候，才知道自己犯了多大的错。

古学进（中国石油天然气集团有限公司咨询中心原副主任）：现在想起来，他是想跟我拉那种关系，为他做一些事。

王合清（重庆市政府文史研究馆原党组书记）：围猎你，那就是个毒饵，要让你上钩。

周小健（湖南省东安县房屋维修资金服务办公室原主任）：我是非常地后悔，真的是太胆大妄为了。

杜娟民（山西省运城市公安局交警支队车管所原查验岗民警）：侵占了老百姓的利益，这你说什么你都说不过去。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Owners of Dingcheng Yuexi in Xi'an, Shaanxi, protested that commercial housing was not separated from resettlement housing, and used a loudspeaker to speak, emphasizing that Article 13 of the Constitution grants people the right to march and demonstrate.
Someone who seemed to be a police officer or a developer told the lady who was speaking: "You must report to the public security bureau in advance." The lady who was speaking retorted: "How do you know I didn't report? We have been to the 1110 police station."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 31, Nanjing, Jiangsu Jinpu Yulongwan delayed delivery, owners gathered to defend their rights, and the developer finally sent people to arrange delivery
December 31, Jiujiang, Jiangxi Guanglong Jiuzuan owners rushed into the sales office and gathered to protest the delayed delivery
January 1, Loudi, Hunan Country Garden Yuejiang Mansion owners surrounded the door of the on-site office building to protest the delayed delivery
January 2, Qingdao, Shandong Jimo Hedaxiyuan owners gathered to protest, and the developer continued to delay delivery

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news: A shooting just happened in Washington, DC, USA, and many people were shot at the scene.
Several emergency rescue vehicles have arrived at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 3, Zhengzhou, Henan, villagers from Xushui Village gathered again in front of the government to demand transition fees. The video said: The resettlement houses (quality) of Xushui Village after demolition did not meet the standards, but they insisted on handing over the houses. To get the keys, you need to pay a high property fee first, and the transition fees have been owed but no one mentioned it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 3, in Nancao Village, Nancao Township, Guancheng District, Zhengzhou, Henan, after living in resettlement housing for 7 years, the local government suddenly said that it would collect rent for the past 7 years! Villagers gathered at the gate of Guancheng District Government to defend their rights
Villagers said: The houses have been allocated to individuals and signed online in their names. Now the local government does not care, and the people can only come to the Guancheng District Committee to ask for an explanation!
Some netizens commented: This is a robbery by bandits
Currently, the relevant videos have been deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 3 (published), a female master's student from Renmin University of China complained about the unsuccessful autumn recruitment and her low mood. She said she received replies from several central and state-owned enterprises, but was eventually eliminated because she was a woman, while those princes and princesses with resources at home were better. She said she felt useless and like a waste, and felt as if she had wasted three years of master's degree.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Last year, thousands of HiPhi Auto employees were owed wages, and the Minhang District government and the trade union stepped in to "mediate" the unpaid wages and posted their achievements on the government's official website. But not long after, the company tore up the mediation agreement reached with the government's intervention, and asked employees to sign another settlement agreement that cut the amount in half again. If you don't want to accept the half-off, you won't get a cent
From April 3, 24, when the mediation agreement was reached with the intervention of the Minhang government, to today, employees have not received their unpaid wages, and have no choice but to post videos to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Employees who were owed wages recently gathered at the company gate to protest their rights, as shown at 46 seconds in the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 4, Zhangjiakou, Hebei. A fire broke out at the Liguang Vegetable Market in Qiaoxi District. The fire has been extinguished. As of 13:56, the fire has caused 8 deaths and 15 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 3, Shanghai. A Russian woman was shopping in a Russian goods store. After she pointed out that many of the goods in the store were not from Russia, she was kicked out by the clerk. The woman said, "Why do Chinese people have to deceive each other?" On January 3, a Russian woman came to a Russian goods store in Guangxi. As a result, the store suddenly lost power halfway through her shopping. The photographer said: "It's because you came."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, blogger "Guichu Notes" posted a video saying, "I find this world very absurd. The rich do wrong, but the poor take the blame. The media calls on us to protect animals, but on the rich's table, there are shark fins, snow clam, wild boar and swan meat. People living at the bottom have never seen these delicacies."
Netizens added: "Public service advertisements about clean government and prohibition of bribery are played on the bus in a loop"
